product_name: Samsung RB21KMFH5SE/D3 Bottom Mount Refrigerator - 218 L - Silver
description: The Digital Inverter Compressor automatically adjusts its speed in response to cooling demand across 4 levels. So it works smarter, minimizes noise, and reduces wear and tear for longer-lasting performance. An external display offers quick and easy access to adjust every function and monitor the status of the refrigerator. As well as providing clear performance information and simple-to-use controls, it also creates a high-tech and modern look with its seamless finish and stylish black background. The high-efficiency, long-lasting LED lighting is slimmer, brighter, and more energy efficient than conventional lighting. It creates more space for food, brilliantly illuminates every corner with softer lighting that’s more comfortable on your eyes, and saves you money on your electricity bills. Tempered glass shelves can safely hold heavy items, like watermelons or marrows. They are designed and tested to withstand a huge weight of up to 150kg. So you don’t need to worry about storing very heavy items on the shelves and even food prepared in heavy pots and pans can be kept cool and fresh.

product_name: Asus 85 UA85AU8000RSFS 4K Smart UHD TV - Black
description: The content never looked so real with 4K UHD Resolution. A TV designed to be watched, not seen. Simple and seamless with Smart Connectivity. Control multiple devices with one remote control*. Find the TV that's right for you. Multiple Voice Assistants - Choose your favorite voice assistant; Bixby, Amazon Alexa, or Google Assistant. For the first time, all are built into your Samsung TV to provide the optimal entertainment experience and advanced control in yours. Crystal Processor 4K - Powerful 4K upscaling ensures you get up to 4K resolution for the content you love. You'll also experience more lifelike color expressions due to its sophisticated color-mapping technology.

product_name: Lenovo Legion M200 RGB Gaming Mouse-WW - Black
description: The Lenovo Legion M200 RGB Gaming Mouse is designed for the beginners and amateur PC gamers. With an ambidextrous comfortable design, it is affordable in price but uncompromised in functionality and performance. Legion M200 features a 5-button design, up to 2400 DPI with 4 levels DPI switch, 7-color circulating-backlight and a braided cable. It is easy-to-use and set-up without any extra complicated software.
